markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Moon May](/Feats.aspx?ID=2331) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your mother was a moon hag, a handmaiden of [Groetus](/Deities.aspx?ID=38), and you have a single scarlet eye and a sliver of her supernal foresight. You can cast [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=142) as an occult innate cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Moon May
